home.name: Town Hollywood
home.description:
Town Hollywood (layout B1.1 – 2 bed / 2 bath). Interior 1,094 sq ft; Balcony 243 sq ft; Total 1,337 sq ft.

Best approach: use sq ft for rough sizing, then take quick real measurements for perfect fit.

options.notes:

options.title: Parent 2 moved Living Room TV (77-inch OLED shortlist: C5 vs G5 vs QD‑OLED)

specs.lanes: {"WOLED_value":"LG C5","WOLED_flagship":"LG G5 (top WOLED tier)","QD-OLED_value":"Samsung S90F","QD-OLED_flagship":"Samsung S95F; Sony A95L"}
specs.dolbyVision: LG + Sony support Dolby Vision; Samsung does not.
specs.gaming: LG C5/G5: 4x HDMI 2.1, VRR, 120/144Hz; Samsung S90F/S95F: high refresh and strong gaming features but no Dolby Vision gaming.

options.notes:
Updated research: Remove B5. Add G5 as LG top WOLED tier. Targets: C5 $1,800–$2,000 with 5-year coverage (club). G5 $3,300–$3,500 with mount + 5-year coverage (club) or ~$3,000 effective via Partner Store stacking. Bright-room order (if glare/brightness is top priority): S95F > S90F > G5 > C5.

Imported from an item with 6 nested options. Nested options were not migrated.
